about_the_game:
In Kitchen Madness, you take on the role of a chef in a dynamic, fast-paced kitchen environment. Start with basic recipes, then earn, trade, and strategize to build your deck with advanced dishes, special ingredients, unique actions and special events.

As orders flood in, you'll need to manage your deck effectively to keep your customers satisfied. Draw from your Action Deck to chop, fry, bake, and clean your way to culinary success. Beware of the Event Deck, where ingredient shortages, rush hours, and surprise inspections can change your strategy in an instant.



Every card in your deck represents a strategic decision and can make the difference between a delighted customer and a disastrous dinner service.

Master the kitchen madness to impress critics, satisfy customers, and create culinary masterpieces!



BACK STORY

In the quiet town of Culina, there was a time when restaurants were unforgettable places, run by Master Chefs who were revered for their culinary skills. These chefs wielded ancient recipe cards, passed down through generations, and were known to create dishes so spectacular that they could enchant the taste buds of anyone who dared to take a bite.

One such place was The Decked Table, an iconic restaurant run by Chef Alfredo, who was known to have the most diverse deck of recipes, actions, and some surprise cards. His kitchen was alive with the clatter of pots and the aroma of spices, and people from all over flocked to The Decked Table to experience his culinary masterpieces.

However, the town of Culina fell into despair when a dark entity known as The Food Forger cursed the land, stealing all the recipe cards and locking them away. The restaurants lost their charm and customers, and the once lively town fell silent.

You play as Chef Alex, a talented young cook and the grandchild of Chef Alfredo. One fine day, while rummaging through the attic, you stumble upon a mysterious box that contains a few of your grandfather's old recipe cards. Suddenly, the spirit of Chef Alfredo appears before you and reveals that you are the chosen one who can break The Food Forger’s curse.

With the town's hopes resting on your shoulders, you take charge of the abandoned Decked Table. Starting with the few recipe cards found in the attic, you must rebuild the restaurant reputation, rediscover lost recipes, and face the challenges thrown at you by the cursed Event Deck.

As you master the art of deck-building and kitchen management, you face off against The Food Forger in epic culinary battles, in a bid to restore the stolen recipe cards to Culina and bring back the golden age of amazing cooking to The Decked Table.

Embark on this delicious journey filled with strategy, challenges, and the magic of cooking in Kitchen Madness. Will you be the one to restore the culinary legacy of Culina?

KEY FEATURES

  • Engaging Deck-Building Mechanic: Strategize and adapt on-the-fly as you build and manage your deck with recipes, actions, and special events.
  • Dynamic Kitchen Environment: Handle a bustling kitchen with orders coming in fast. Can you keep up with the pace?
  • Unpredictable Events: Adapt to unexpected events that can change your strategy in an instant.
  • Advanced Recipes and Ingredients: Earn, trade, and upgrade your deck with advanced recipes and special ingredients to impress your customers.
  • Endless Replayability: With countless combinations of cards and unpredictable events, every playthrough brings a unique challenge.

  • Processor: Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D Capable Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Kitchen Madness is a frantic deck-building kitchen management game for the strategic solo player. As the head chef, you must assemble recipes, juggle ingredients, and manage unexpected events to whip up delicious dishes before the ticking clock sends your customers away hungry.
